title: How do I switch from standard user interface to the simple user interface on my Ascend Mate2?
answer:
You can switch to our simple user interface by holding down on any open space on your home screen.  You will see "Set Home Screen" window pop-up.  Then you can select "Simple home" to switch to the simple user interface. 

 If you want to switch back to "Standard Home", select the "Standard Home" tile from the simple user interface.
keywords: standard user interface simple switch, mate2, mate2
